item.title: moonside inn
item.description:
this week: 1103-1109

this week was productive tm, but i still kind of feel a little all over. tried taking daily notes in obsidian but it was no good, only made it a few days before i forgot again

media

  • interstellar
    a rewatch with some friends (my first time watching with other people)! the music was amazing as i remembered. watched a bunch of youtube videos about black holes with my housemate when we got home
  • gachiakuta
  • skip and loafer
  • the long journey to a small angry planet
  • origens - filo machado
    i saw his cover of a milton nascimento song in my recommended on youtube and found this album of his from the 80s!
  • the sims 4
    i spent all day fixing the mods before i could actually play...then i finally got to add a few new sims to my forever save but the story has already gotten soo messy ðŸ˜­

item.title: moonside inn
item.description:
weekly update

home

made some updates to my home page, including a little camera roll of recent photos i've taken

recipes

recipe book

i made cinnamon rolls for the first time in years, I adapted the recipe from Professional Baking by Wayne Glissen. if you try it let me know how they came out in my guestbook!

music

music

new album of the week!

books

books

made some progress on A Journey to a Small Angry Planet, this week i'm offically locked in ahah. dnf'd DIE though, not sure what it was but I wasn't really captured by the story so I'll be returning it to the library

item.title: moonside player
item.description: an update to my music page featuring album of the week, my top albums, and a few playlists/mixes i've made!
